system.effect: Gain +10 to tests to resist Toxins/Poisons. Has 6 Pain Suppressant doses, Allowing Wearer to ignore Chacteristic Damage/Penalties from crit-damage for 1d10 rounds. If wearer is stunned, effect is automatically ended after one round.

description.value: Gain +10 to tests to resist Toxins/Poisons. Has 6 Pain Suppressant doses, Allowing Wearer to ignore Chacteristic Damage/Penalties from crit-damage for 1d10 rounds. If wearer is stunned, effect is automatically ended after one round.
